fields.description:
*+Objective+*
 * Improve related ad relevancy to user so we can improve engagement with Related Ad for further lead generation.
 * Expose more attributes on related ad to improve CTR

*+BE Implementation+*
 # Location: within the same L3 location
 # Price: 10% deviation (plus and minus) and across currency (USD/ MXN = 19); exclude contact me option in the related ad; if this ad price is contact me, we skip step 2.
 # Type: same type
 # # of bedroom: same # (if the sub category doesn't have this attribute, we skip this)
 # # of bathroom: same # (if the sub category doesn't have this attribute, we skip this)
 # Exclude listing from the same seller
 # If step 1 to 6 can't provide sufficient listing, we fall back price at 15% (plus and minus). 
 # If step 6 still can't provide sufficient listing, we will add in more listing by falling back # of bedroom and # of bath room, +1 for both attributes. For example, 1 room not enough, fall back 2 rooms + 1 room. 
 # According to the result, BE provide new data points to support additional FE design - # of bedroom, # of bathroom, # of garage, Superficie

*+FE Implementation+*
 * Add in # of bedroom, # of bathroom, # of garage info

*+Mock-up+*
 * Desktop - [https://zpl.io/brrLpJ7]
 * Mobile - [https://zpl.io/V0EAkDw]

*+AB testing set-up+*
 * Control - current related ad
 * Testing - new algorithm and display
 * Main metrics - session with click on related ad/ all session; RE VIP improves 58% of this metric and it's now 14%+.
fields.summary: Absorb or render unnecessary patches used by vcpkg to build the driver

comments.body:
Let's see if we can use open source to update USD/MXN regular basis.

for example: [https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/USDMXN=x?ltr=1]
[~evan2], pls. help to take a look whether we can update the ex rate by weekly

[~jerome] 

for the rule 
 # If step 6 still can't provide sufficient listing, we fall back # of bedroom and # of bath room, +1 for both attributes.

 

if the bedroom's original value is 5 , then do fall back  the bedroom's new value is how much? 6 or (5 and 6) 

 

when I test in my local ,if the bedroom's value is 5 , I can get some result 。but if the value change to 6 , maybe no result return .
[~jerome]  the similar ads for ND's best result size is ? , I didn't see a number in the ticket

[~jerome] solr support USD_MXN exchange rate search . for ad (which's currency is USD)  , solr also search MXN ads。 now We use solr to support this function.

for srp price search , they also use the solr function
So How much ads would be send to fe?

[~evan2]   I found in each ads, view count for this ads is not easy to get, is that possible also return "view count"?

 

although it could be found in 

ad._embedded.statistics.viewCount 

I will talk to you later

Hi [~evan2] I notice this ticket contains 3 things "# of bedroom, # of bathroom, # of garage"  but in api it doesn't contain garge.

 

[~jerome] Does this ticket contains garage?
[~evan2] [~yuanhuang] Yes, we want to expose garage info on FE as well Superficie. Let's sync today.

items.toString: Ranked higher

*+Objective+*
* Improve related ad relevancy to user so we can improve engagement with Related Ad for further lead generation. 
* Expose more attributes on related ad to improve CTR

*+Implementation+*
* Location: within the same L3 location; fall back to L2 if there isn't enough listing
* Price: 10% deviation; fall back 5% if there isn't enough listing; exclude contact me option
* Type: same type; fall back to other types if there isn't enough listing
* # of bedroom: same #; fall back +1 if there isn't enough listing

*+AB testing set-up+*
*

items.toString:
*+Objective+*
 * Improve related ad relevancy to user so we can improve engagement with Related Ad for further lead generation.
 * Expose more attributes on related ad to improve CTR

*+BE Implementation+*
 # Location: within the same L3 location
 # Price: 10% deviation (plus and minus); exclude contact me option
 # Type: same type; Desarollo and Venta are treated as the same type.
 # # of bedroom: same # (if the sub category doesn't have this attribute, we skip this)
 # # of bathroom: same # (if the sub category doesn't have this attribute, we skip this)
 # Exclude listing from the same seller
 # If step 1 to 6 can't provide sufficient listing, we fall back price at 15% (plus and minus). 
 # If step 6 still can't provide sufficient listing, we fall back # of bedroom and # of bath room, +1 for both attributes.
 # According to the result, BEp provide new data points to support additional FE design - # of bedroom, # of bathroom, # of garage

*+FE Implementation+*
 * Add in # of bedroom, # of bathroom, # of garage info

*+Mock-up+*
 * Desktop - [https://zpl.io/brrLpJ7]
 * Mobile - [https://zpl.io/V0EAkDw]

*+AB testing set-up+*
 * Control - current related ad
 * Testing - new algorithm and display
 * Main metrics - session with click on related ad/ all session; RE VIP improves 58% of this metric and it's now 14%+.

 # Location: within the same L3 location

 # Type: same type; Desarollo and Venta are treated as the same type.
 # # of bedroom: same # (if the sub category doesn't have this attribute, we skip this)
 # # of bathroom: same # (if the sub category doesn't have this attribute, we skip this)
 # Exclude listing from the same seller
 # If step 1 to 6 can't provide sufficient listing, we fall back price at 15% (plus and minus). 
 # If step 6 still can't provide sufficient listing, we fall back # of bedroom and # of bath room, +1 for both attributes.
 # According to the result, BEp provide new data points to support additional FE design - # of bedroom, # of bathroom, # of garage

*+FE Implementation+*
 * Add in # of bedroom, # of bathroom, # of garage info

*+Mock-up+*
 * Desktop - [https://zpl.io/brrLpJ7]
 * Mobile - [https://zpl.io/V0EAkDw]

*+AB testing set-up+*
 * Control - current related ad
 * Testing - new algorithm and display
 * Main metrics - session with click on related ad/ all session; RE VIP improves 58% of this metric and it's now 14%+.

*+Objective+*
 * Improve related ad relevancy to user so we can improve engagement with Related Ad for further lead generation.
 * Expose more attributes on related ad to improve CTR

*+BE Implementation+*
 # Location: within the same L3 location
 # Price: 10% deviation (plus and minus) and across currency (USD/ MXN = 19); exclude contact me option in the related ad; if this ad price is contact me, we skip step 2.
 # Type: same type
 # # of bedroom: same # (if the sub category doesn't have this attribute, we skip this)
 # # of bathroom: same # (if the sub category doesn't have this attribute, we skip this)
 # Exclude listing from the same seller
 # If step 1 to 6 can't provide sufficient listing, we fall back price at 15% (plus and minus). 
 # If step 6 still can't provide sufficient listing, we will add in more listing by falling back # of bedroom and # of bath room, +1 for both attributes. For example, 1 room not enough, fall back 2 rooms + 1 room. 
 # According to the result, BE provide new data points to support additional FE design - # of bedroom, # of bathroom, # of garage

*+FE Implementation+*
 * Add in # of bedroom, # of bathroom, # of garage info

*+Mock-up+*
